sql.if: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(bno, title, writer, content) values(freeboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rn, tbl.* from( select b.* , ( select count(*) from freereply r where r.bno = b.bno) as reply_count from freeboard b order by bno desc) tbl) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{cpp} and rn <= #{pageNum} * #{cpp}
mapper.update: update freeboard set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
update freeboard set view_count = view_count + 1 where bno = #{bno}
